trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) hurls a tarot card with the image of the Hanged Man on it at you\. As it reaches you\, a huge mass of rope bursts out of it\, entrapping and hindering you\.$
trigger.name: tarot_hangedman__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at you\, and a jester appears with a slack[\- ]jawed expression\. With a mad jingling of his bells\, the fool (?:plants an enormous kiss on your lips\.|pinches your nose and shouts\, \"WHOOP\! WHOOP\! WHOOP\!\"\.?|squirts water at you from a large flower\.|throws a custard pie in your face\.)$
trigger.name: tarot_fool__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) throws a Lovers tarot at you and as it strikes true\, you fall hopelessly in love with [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: tarot_lovers__

trigger.match: ^A glowing axe appears and strikes you in the chest\.$
trigger.name: tarot_warrior__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at you which turns an ominous\, sickly red before striking you in the head\.$
trigger.name: tarot_moon__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) deftly flings a Dreamer tarot at you\, and the card dissolves into a warm\, cloying mist that clouds your mind\.$
trigger.name: tarot_dreamer__

trigger.match: ^You are suddenly spooked by an image from your dreams and lose some of your attentiveness\.$
trigger.name: tarot_dreamer_tick__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at you\, which expands into an image of Juliana\. A set of scales appears above your head and one side of the scale quickly descends\. You have a bad feeling about this\.$
trigger.name: tarot_judge__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) stands an Aeon tarot on [hH](?:is|er) palm and blows it at you\.$
trigger.name: tarot_aeon__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) quickly flings a tarot card at you\, and you feel unreasonable lust for [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: tarot_lust__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) rubs a tarot card on your arm\. A cold jolt travels through your being\.$
trigger.name: tarot_soulless_rub__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at you and upon impact\, it disappears\. An ominous silence overtakes your surroundings\.$
trigger.name: tarot_soulless_fling__

trigger.match: ^The tarot card hits your magical shield\, which immediately explodes upon impact\.$
trigger.name: tarot_world__
